title: Case Number Check
caseNumber: What is the case number of the case you are responding to?
hint: This will appear on the letter sent to you from the employment tribunal.

ethosCaseReference.required: Enter case number. Sample case number format is 1111111/2020
ethosCaseReference.invalid: Invalid case number. Sample Case number format is 1111111/2020

hiddenErrorField.api: A system error occurred. Please try again later.
